properties.name: c2s.pcm.config.clinicaldata.maximumUploadFileSize
properties.description: Max allowed file size in bytes for clinical document files uploaded to PCM directly by a patient or other user.

properties.name: c2s.pcm.config.clinicaldata.extensionsPermittedToUpload
properties.description: Comma separated list of permitted file extensions for clinical document files uploaded to PCM.

properties.name: c2s.pcm.config.clamd.host
properties.description: Host name or IP address of server instance of ClamAV to use for virus scanning uploaded clinical document files.

properties.name: c2s.pcm.config.clamd.port
properties.description: Port number to connect to on host server instance of ClamAV to use for virus scanning uploaded clinical document files.

properties.name: c2s.pcm.config.clamd.connTimeOut
properties.description: Time in seconds to wait before timing out when sending a clinical document file to ClamAV server.
